name: python-language-server_definition
description: Read the source code definition of a symbol (function, type, constant, etc.) from the codebase. Returns the complete implementation code where the symbol is defined.

symbolName.description: The name of the symbol whose definition you want to find (e.g. 'mypackage.MyFunction', 'MyType.MyMethod')

name: python-language-server_diagnostics
description: Get diagnostic information for a specific file from the language server.

contextLines.description: Lines to include around each diagnostic.

filePath.description: The path to the file to get diagnostics for

showLineNumbers.description: If true, adds line numbers to the output

name: python-language-server_edit_file
description: Apply multiple text edits to a file.

endLine.description: End line to replace, inclusive, one-indexed

newText.description: Replacement text. Replace with the new text. Leave blank to remove lines.

startLine.description: Start line to replace, inclusive, one-indexed

filePath.description: Path to the file to edit

name: python-language-server_hover
description: Get hover information (type, documentation) for a symbol at the specified position.

column.description: The column number where the hover is requested (1-indexed)

filePath.description: The path to the file to get hover information for

line.description: The line number where the hover is requested (1-indexed)

name: python-language-server_references
description: Find all usages and references of a symbol throughout the codebase. Returns a list of all files and locations where the symbol appears.

symbolName.description: The name of the symbol to search for (e.g. 'mypackage.MyFunction', 'MyType')

name: python-language-server_rename_symbol
description: Rename a symbol (variable, function, class, etc.) at the specified position and update all references throughout the codebase.

column.description: The column number where the symbol is located (1-indexed)

filePath.description: The path to the file containing the symbol to rename

line.description: The line number where the symbol is located (1-indexed)

newName.description: The new name for the symbol
